languages.text: "На тебя. Я впервые вижу друкари так близко".
"You. I have never seen a Drukhari at such close quarters before."
languages.original_text: "На тебя. Я впервые вижу друкари так близко".

traits.locale_text: "You. I have never seen a Drukhari at such close quarters before."
"You. I have never seen a Drukhari at such close quarters before."
"You. I have never seen a Drukhari at such close quarters before."
"You. I have never seen a Drukhari at such close quarters before."

languages.text: “我在看你，我以前从来没这么近距离观察过黑暗灵族。”
languages.original_text: "You. I have never seen a Drukhari at such close quarters before."

traits.locale_text: “我在看你，我以前从来没这么近距离观察过黑暗灵族。”

languages.text: 「お前は…デュカーリをこれほど近くで見たのは初めてだ」
languages.original_text: "You. I have never seen a Drukhari at such close quarters before."

traits.locale_text: 「お前は…デュカーリをこれほど近くで見たのは初めてだ」

languages.text: «A ti. Nunca antes había visto un drukhari tan de cerca».
languages.original_text: "You. I have never seen a Drukhari at such close quarters before."

traits.locale_text: «A ti. Nunca antes había visto un drukhari tan de cerca».

languages.text: « Vous. Je n'avais encore jamais vu un Drukhari d'aussi près. »
languages.original_text: "You. I have never seen a Drukhari at such close quarters before."

traits.locale_text: « Vous. Je n'avais encore jamais vu un Drukhari d'aussi près. »

languages.text: "Ich gucke Euch an. Ich habe noch nie einen Drukhari aus so unmittelbarer Nähe gesehen."
languages.original_text: "You. I have never seen a Drukhari at such close quarters before."

traits.locale_text: "Ich gucke Euch an. Ich habe noch nie einen Drukhari aus so unmittelbarer Nähe gesehen."

languages.text: "Sana bakıyorum. Daha önce bir Drukhari'yi hiç bu kadar yakın mesafeden görmemiştim."
languages.original_text: "You. I have never seen a Drukhari at such close quarters before."

traits.locale_text: "Sana bakıyorum. Daha önce bir Drukhari'yi hiç bu kadar yakın mesafeden görmemiştim."
